about.summary: Computations related to group sequential boundaries. Includes calculation of bounds using the Lan-DeMets alpha spending function approach. Based on FORTRAN program ld98 implemented by Reboussin, et al. (2000) <doi:10.1016/s0197-2456(00)00057-x>.

Computations related to group sequential boundaries. Includes calculation of bounds using the Lan-DeMets alpha spending function approach. Based on FORTRAN program ld98 implemented by Reboussin, et al. (2000) <doi:10.1016/s0197-2456(00)00057-x>.

name: r-ldbounds
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.0.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ldbounds
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ldbounds_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ldbounds/ldbounds_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a98d8498e46fd814957e7d47a6bf3d27649885ed840c0753469f268b8942bda7

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ldbounds')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ldbounds')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ldbounds
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Computations related to group sequential boundaries. Includes calculation of bounds
    using the Lan-DeMets alpha spending function approach. Based on FORTRAN program
    ld98 implemented by Reboussin, et al. (2000) <doi:10.1016/s0197-2456(00)00057-x>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# Package: ldbounds
# Type: Package
# Title: Lan-DeMets Method for Group Sequential Boundaries
# Version: 2.0.2
# Date: 2023-12-01
# Author: Charlie Casper, Thomas Cook and Oscar A. Perez.  Based on FORTRAN program ld98.
# Maintainer: Charlie Casper <charlie.casper@hsc.utah.edu>
# Description: Computations related to group sequential boundaries. Includes calculation of bounds using the Lan-DeMets alpha spending function approach. Based on FORTRAN program ld98 implemented by Reboussin, et al. (2000) <doi:10.1016/s0197-2456(00)00057-x>.
# Imports: graphics, stats
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Suggests: R.rsp
# VignetteBuilder: R.rsp
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2023-12-01 20:06:09 UTC; tcasper
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2023-12-02 00:40:10 UTC
